description: This Java class defines a REST controller 'HealthController' for a Spring Boot application. It provides a lightweight health check endpoint at '/health' that always returns a 200 OK status with a status indicator 'UP'. Optionally, it checks the database connectivity via the NoteRepository, logging the result, but it never fails the endpoint response regardless of database status.

classes.name: HealthController
classes.description: A REST controller providing a health check endpoint for the application, with optional database connectivity verification.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/health'. Returns a JSON response with overall application status ('UP') and database status, which is checked via NoteRepository. Always responds with HTTP 200 OK.
